eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A CHILD ABDUCTION EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Texas; AT 06:16 PM ON SEP 19, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 06:16 PM SEP 20, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: AMBER Alert: Child Abduction from San Antonio, Texas. Suspect vehicle is a White 2020 Nissan Kicks with Texas license plate V T J 8 6 1 0. Missing child is Leah Calderon, 4 year old white female. Suspect is Britany Zepeda 34 year old white female. Call San Antonio Police Department with information. If seen call 9 1 1.
